content.detailedDescription:
I was awoken around 3:30am not feeling well. so, i paid bills and took envelopes out to mailbox little after 4:30am it was a nice night and looked up to the south as the half moon was in the southeast at roughly 45° from horizon just enjoying the view. i then noticed off to the south southwest slightly higher up in the sky a blue line that appeared about 1 inch in size in the night sky and was clearly the brightest object besides the moon. you could see mars and saturn off toward the moon so it was not the double planet conjunction.

the thing that stood out was that it was a very bright blue line in the sky with orb look at the top end.  i tried to take photos of it but i am not happy with the digital camera as the moon light worked against the exposure and i could not keep my camera steady enough. i also tried to video tape it and again, i could not see the object or line in the video screen on the camera and it does not look like i captured anything. no stars or anything in that part of the sky in the video i looked at. i will look at it again under a better replay format that i can change contrast.

frustrated with the poor camera capture attempts, i grabbed my binoculars which is pretty powerful with a zoom and looked at the objects. the brightest object was in the middle and had a light bulb shaped appearance. the was a circular orb of off white slightly yellowish just above the light bulb or tear shaped bright object and barely could see that they were separate objects.  the light bulb object was appearing blue white and had a blue light beam extending down to a third object which was a very dull blue colored circular orb that was not visible to the naked eye and i did not know it was there until i viewed with binoculars. 

when i first observed the objects they were just below the clouds. i do  not know the altitude of the clouds that night but they were most likely over 10,000 feet. i continued to observe the object as it just sat in the same spot. then it appeared to rise and went above the clouds for a few minutes before dropping below the clouds.  i should note that the cloud cover was very sparse and light. eventually, around 5:50am the objects never really breaking formation the whole time just rose and disappeared as it moved higher and higher. given its altitude, it should have been noticed by anyone in west texas from lubbock to midland odessa. 

as a side note: the appearance of these objects appear to be very similar to the event that happened in 2012 in lubbock and were all over the news. at that time, the objects were observed around llpm to around 1am.  additionally, i will review my photo attempts to see if i can see anything useful and relay along with this report.
content.summary: Light bulb shaped with blue white beam to another craft below

content.detailedDescription: Was on vacation took shuttle to summit of mt. washington.Took photos of view from observation deck. have pictures on phone and never looked close until yesterday. found picture i took of auto road and found object in background. i didn't see at the time. i thought you would find interesting.
content.summary: Found object on picture

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, my job for the day was to stay in the store and work behind the register. few hours go by and it wasn't too busy, so my manager decided i should go to the warehouse and help the warehouse guy. i waited for the driver from the warehouse to come pick me up. finally he came and told me that i was going to drive. as soon as a get into the car i got this weird feeling that i needed to look for something in the sky, like i knew that there was going to be something there eventually.  so as were driving i'm actually looking into the sky, as we get closer to the warehouse i spot it in the sky and i immediately knew that that was it. i told my coworker that i was finally going to show him what i'm seeing all this time. we get to the warehouse and i quickly get out of the car to see this object and it started glowing this beautiful green light and my co-work was pretty surprised when he witnessed it. i knew this object wasn't a balloon or a drone because i've been seeing these things quite frequently as of late and i get this strange feeling of emotion and adrenaline going thru me when i see these things. so i think there is some kind of connection when i see these things in the sky. of course my coworker was still skeptical during the sighting of what it actually was. you'll hear it in the video. i actually had no intention of recording this object but my coworker actually convinced me to do it, and i'm happy that i did because this some good footage. so we just stared at it till it got so tiny and we lost sight of it. that was it, we just continued our day of work.
content.summary: The closest sighting i ever witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: My dogs began growling in the living room at 11 p.M., thursday, april 5, 2018, cst. i live on a farm and the cows in the pasture across the street were mooing loudly. i went to the large picture window in the living room facing west. i looked for coyotes or other animals. my dogs wer looking out the glass of the door and the window. the cows were looking up. i observed a huge round white light traveling slowly towards my direction. the light became larger and brighter, then appeared to stop, and began pulsating. this continued 15 minutes, then like flicking off a light switch, it was gone. as soon as it disappeared, the cows quieted, and my dogs stopped growling. everything was still and quiet. i looked at the clock, and 15 minutes had passed since i began watching. i was curious and tried to reason out what it could be. it was odd that my dogs never barked. i felt very alert. this is not my first experience here. it is a rural area with an open sky.
content.summary: Heard dogs my growling and cows in field across street mooing loud. looked out picture window in living room. observed hug light object approaching, then pulsing 15 minutes, then abruptly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Me my husband and my son were staying at a local business after closing to have the furnace be installed into the building. it was approximately 7 p.M. and my son had went outside to see what the loud roaring noise was. my husband yelled to me get over here quick i proceeded to walk out our business store and look up to see three vietnam looking blackhawk helicopter choppers hovering over us heading towards detroit i've never seen military style helicopters like this before we live close to a military air base that i am used to seeing jets and cargo planes come and go but to see military style choppers with a white star on the side and then being hunter green as if they were going into combat was something very odd to me and my husband. usually if something is going on or going to be tested it would be on the news i have looked all over our local media are channel outlets and there was no news on this event. how can something so loud so rare and so out of place go not announced. this actually gave me and my husband chills. when i am reporting an unidentified object i'm not reporting an unidentified alien. i'm reporting something on identified i seen the government doing and i would like to know what is going on.
content.summary: This object is classified as unidentified because of the rarity of three military choppers in this area

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street in detroit when a couple of aliens who were up to no good started making trouble in my neighbourhood. they emitted a white smoke from their feeding holes and spoke in an incompressible language eerily similar to english. they bumped into me and i fled.
content.summary: Walking in detroit city, interacted with and assualted by black colored aliens

content.detailedDescription:
I stared out my window of the second story of a 2 story apartment and a bright yellow light just appeared over a building just behind my apartment. it moved closer to the tree tops on the edgd of my lawn, i could see one really bright yellow light and three small yellow lights. 
it moved very slowly, and without sound along the edge of the tree tops. then finally hovered in the furthest edge of the woods. then dissappeared. 
i knew it wasn't a helecopter because it was silent and they usually have a red light. i knew it was a ufo but it definitely creeped me out.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 or 4 yellow lights right next to my house

content.detailedDescription:
21uhr/9pm 
ich war im garten
im sternbild "großer wagen" licht blinkte. (2x größer als ein stern)

min. 6 minuten sah ich:

-licht blitze ein mal auf 

4 - 7 sekunden nicht mehr zu sehen (dunkel)

-licht dimmt auf

4 - 7 sekunden nicht mehr zu sehen (dunkel)

-licht blitze ein mal auf 

........

an der stelle wo dieses objekt war 
erschien ein stern der richtung norden flog



mein handy ist nicht gut im dunkeln
kann keine sterne filmen
content.summary: Constellation big dipper

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming the sunrise,
watched unusual number of what i thought were chemtrailers.
no feelings
lost sight because i stopped because i was too cold.
content.summary: I was filming the sunrise

content.detailedDescription: My cousin nancy brought this photo to my attention. she would like to remain anonymous. nancy was taking photos in sedona az and captured 4 dark objects. in my opinion they are not birds, but i am no expert. i have captured objects similar to this with my camera in sedona, but not as clear. nancy didn't notice the objects at the time the photo was taken.
content.summary: 4 dark objects captured on cellphone.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone to sleep shortly after 11 pm 4/3 on sofa in my living room, which had light from tv and some decorative small lights i keep on at nighttime. i was on my side and suddenly i awoke (not having to use restroom) and looked up. on my (10’ high) ceiling just about 2-3 feet from right above  me was a strange about 10” with extremities  “daddie long legs” but mechanical with 8 or more tenicles or fishing wire colored legs and black or dark round (1-2 cm diameter) “feet” attached to each leg. i couldn’t give the thickness of the “feet”. 

it seemed to be watching me or taking data(?) and perhaps when it saw me notice it, it scampered. (spider like) very quickly  straight  along the ceiling (about 15’) to the wall where it vanished.  there was no center, or body to it.  i’d say i got a 1-2 second glimpse of it while it was stationary almost above me, and then another 1-2 seconds till it reached the wall. as mentioned, i was fully awake, thinking perhaps this non organic (seeming) “visitor” had woken me, tho it emitted no light or sound. it was after it disappeared, that i noticed the time to be 1:15am. i was able lay down and to fall back asleep. i was not under any influence of drugs, medications, or alcohol, or any mind altering substances, and was fully awake when i noticed the object.

my reaction wasn’t really fearful, perhaps because it had relayed a harmless message. i picked up that it was taking data (?) and when it saw me notice, it scampered across the ceiling never dropping lower. nothing like this has ever happened to me. i was alone in the house, other than my small dog who didn’t notice it at all. 

naturally, i’m extremely curious to hear if anyone else has had a similar experience with an object as described. last night, 4/4, i did email george noory regarding this unexpected encounter, which i’d assume is ufo related. also, i do think if i were to see this thing again, i would be frightened. hopefully it found me to be a waste of time for any future visits!
content.summary: Strange 10” diameter mechanical spider like object above me in my home

content.detailedDescription: Strangebriht light
content.summary: It was just a bright white sphere appearance and moving slowly like they’re observing something, 3-4mins the object vanished and i only see it heading to se, not a plane and a head light of a plane.

content.detailedDescription: On vacation in kauai.  trying out the camera on the new iphone.  out for an afternoon walk in the hills outside of kapaa.  took a random shot using the live setting on the camera.  did not notice anything unusual until later when i saw the object shooting across the enitre frame.  it had to occur in less then a second or whatever the amount of time that iphone defaults to for it's live setting.  i am sending the live gif  a blow up of the object and the original.
content.summary: Snapshot using iphone x on live setting.  object crosses entire frame in on shot that can be seen when looping photo.  crosse entire horizon in less then a second.

content.detailedDescription: I do not want my story publicly shared. i want to find help for my experience. please help.
content.summary: I was violated while having an experience.

content.detailedDescription: Looking south west at 11:00pm saw a red dot moving in from north toward south and making rapid directional changes but way to high to be a plane and crossing sky way to fast to be a satellite, zig-zag trajectory could be seen as if high enough to be lighted by the sun below horizon...
content.summary: Star like changing direction constantly for about 10 secs high above clouds

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were driving down waasis road, approaching the burton bridge when i noticed a plane flying over the saint john river. there was nothing off about it until the plane seemed to stop mid-air above the river. just stationary as if frozen in time. it made no noise, emitted nothing. i'm not sure what kind of plane it was, but it had the markings of an air canada plane and its landing gear was deployed. after a few seconds stunned and trying to make sense of what was going on the plane vanished. the disappearance wasn't flashy, the thing was seemingly just erased from existence, it was there, then it wasn't. i didn't tell my friend about it until we stopped driving as not to distract him on an icy canadian road. he said he did see a plane over the river but didn't notice it stop or vanish.
content.summary: What looks like a passenger plane flies normaly over the saint john, haults mid-air, then disapears.

content.detailedDescription: My sister was taking photos of the sunset, and when she watched the images an object could be seen clearly in the clouds.
content.summary: Strange object in photos.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash,then out of no where i saw lights a mile away from me.I walkies down the road from my house and stopped at the nearest stop sign.I thought it was just a my eyes playing tricks on me,but i was actually seeing this,for the first time i saw a ufo.The shape of the ufo was like a huge oval and had a antenna above it. it was hovering over the clouds, then it stopped....10 seconds later it drove off. i went running towards it but it disappeared in the air.I felt anonymously scared to the questions i asked myself: was it real? was it there longer than 10 seconds? what made it go away? did it see me?
content.summary: Left in 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 4:30 one morning i woke up on the couch to a bright glowing light moving east from over the ocean towards the shoreline. the object flew silently and had a heat emulsion emitted from behind. as it reached the shire, it hovered, then moved in a northerly direction. as it passed near the nuclear power plant in avila beach, a radish glowing orb separated from the craft in an arcing fashion towards the plant. after which the craft accelerated rapidly in a nw direction until it disappeared in the distance. 

i lived in an ocean facing condo in the shell beach portion of pismo beach at the time of the occurance.
content.summary: Glowing silent craft came from the west over the ocean. it hovered, then moved north. a red orb separated in an arcing fashion towards the nuclear power plant the accelerated nw

content.detailedDescription: Was at marine park in bellingham .Ready to go home from walking dog. when i saw 3 oramge lights traveling separately but in same direction . theu were in a tight formation like a line. they were coming from tbe south , going north i believe. they separated widely then turned back to south towards lummi island i think. lost sight of them after awhile.N
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 orange orbs traveling north then south west

content.detailedDescription: I was in a local park in addiscombe, croydon, uk with my dog and a group of approx eight other dog walkers. i saw the black donut shaped object which appeared to be approximately 18" across enter the park airspace from the east above houses approximately 100 feet away. its height was only about 30 feet above the ground, so only just above the roof tops. it was traveling west very slowly, much slower than walking pace. it slowly ascending in height and at some points it stopped moving and was completely static. it then continued to rise in height. i watched it do a 180 degree flip so the bottom of the object became the top this happened at least twice. when it flipped it appeared to be in complete control of the movement not bouncing around like it would if the wind was affecting its movement. i pointed the object out to the other dog walkers and about five of us watched it continuously all the time it was gaining height. at one point a passenger aircraft also crossed the park. the passenger aircraft  had either taken off or was getting ready to land, the aircraft seemed to be much lower than we normally observe maybe 2000 feet at the point we saw the aircraft the donut object was above it at least twice as high as the aircraft. it was i thought unusual that we could still clearly see the object at such a height when it was relitivly so small in comparison to the aircraft although i couldn't see the central hole of the object. the object continued to ascend until it was too small to see any more.
content.summary: I watched the object come just above roof height and ascend until it was higher than a passenger aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:15 pm tonight i was outside smoking a cigarette and admiring the stars i noticed what i thought was a star and it was moving from west to east,ithen i thought to myself this isnt a star because it was lower that any other star i seen.I continued to watch it until i left my sight.
content.summary: Star like no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was just got off the phone and was looking out my sliding glass door.5th floor facing sw i think.It was ties 


about 12 or 1 .Theirs a large kcrane.Then i looked up and saw 2 dull black light silver had a round middle with like 4 legs each side kinda like hairiest table legs.It didn't move for 20 min or so.Then disappeared i have some photos but don't know how to download or send them. 
sorry bout the letter i am not to tecky ?
content.summary: Two of them dull black ligth siiver with pointy three legs each side ?

content.detailedDescription: I was approximately 10 or 11 years old.  i was sent by my mother into the burger king on plymouth road to get dinner for my immediate family.  the line was packed with easily over 25 people in two lines.  ahead of me by about 10 people, i seen the weird looking back of a "man"'s head.  what was so weird was that his head looked like a pink brain.  it seems he must have felt me staring at him because he turned around to look at me.  his face, while humanoid, was not human and he looked very scary with big evil eyes.  he absolutely terrified me with his sinister demonic look.  he got his order, i soon got mine and left.  i still remember the total fear as i waited for my turn.  i still find it incredible that this strange looking entity was getting burgers and no one but me could see him.
content.summary: Pink brain headed entity at local burger king

content.detailedDescription: Me and my three room mates were backpacking in the south jackson mountain wilderness area in nevada. the first night we were camped fairly close to the dirt road where we left our car so we decided to do a night time hike back to the car to get some more supplies. as we reached the car, one of my room mates pointed at the sky in complete shock. we all finally looked and saw a bright flashing light moving across the sky. at first we thought it was a satellite or plane but upon further evaluation and observation we came to the realization that either of those two options were borderline impossible. the reason for this conclusion came from watching this object change direction, change its flight path, change its brightness intensity almost as if it was looking at us or noticing us as we began to flash our lights at it. this strange behavior continued for another minute or so before the object faded out again from one of its flashes and then instantly streaked miles across the sky leaving behind it a neon blue streak moving at speeds i have never seen before. the strangest part of this whole encounter was the emotional connection felt with the object. not only did it seem to notice and look at us once we started flashing it with our head lamps, but once the blue flash happened everyone either started tearing up or staring blankly out of pure shock. obviously this was a reality shaking event so the emotions felt are pretty explainable but there was something about noticing the light and it staring right back at us that left us all very unnerved for the rest of the night. after the blue streak, the light blinked possibly two more times headed in the same direction it was previously headed and faintly and simply just disappeared.
content.summary: Saw blinking light in sky that pulsated in an unorganized pattern that seemed to get brighter and closer once we noticed it. it then flashed away leaving a blue streak behind it.

content.detailedDescription: As husband & i were driving home from his place of work, after 9:00 pm, we saw in the sky directly over and in front of our car a black rectangular object with red glowing bars of light on the short sides of the rectangular shape. also there was a blinking red light following. it was silently gliding across the sky - no noise at all. we pulled over to get out and look, but being in the middle of downtown it disappeared behind some buildings, as if it descended straight down. my husband's cell phone was not working properly afterwards. i don't currently have one so nothing else to report other than i woke continuously from my sleep throughout the night with nausea and still felt the same the next morning and throughout the earlier part of the day.
content.summary: Directly and silently flew straight line over my vehicle, black rectangular, red glowing lights on short sides of rectangle, blinking red light following.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work down a country road and noticed a fast moving ball of light following a train track.  thinking it was a train i groaned, hoping to not be late for work, but when i looked again, it was just a ball of light.  it followed the tracks and disappeared. it seemed to disappear into the horizon toward the sun, but when i first saw it, it was definitely a ball of light. there was a person in a car in front of me who must have seen it as well, but we did not communicate nor did i get a license plate number.

this only lasted at tops 10 - 15 seconds, but it was the oddest thing i've ever seen in my life
content.summary: Bright white light moving super fast following a train track

content.detailedDescription: While in my daughters room at 4:00 am i looked out her window which was south, and noticed two objects and immediately thought they were planes crossing paths. after looking again, i didn’t see they had moved like a plane, but in fact remained hovering. both objects seemed to accend higher, and into the clouds, but still remained hovering in the same spot up to 20 minutes until i went back to bed.
content.summary: Noticed out the window, assumed they were planes crossing paths at first. notice she they weren’t flying, but hovering. the top object acended higher. they both went behind the clouds, then remained in then same spot hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs down the street after four in the morning on a clear night here in sw florida. i looked around the sky and stars and noticed red lights similar to an airplanes.  watching it for 3-4 minutes, it never moved its position.  i thought to myself to try to take a picture of it.  my camera started recording in movie mode.  i uploaded it to my computer a few days later.  i saw nothing in the 37 second recording.  but when i slowed it to frame by frame, an object cylinder in shape with an open center appeared and then shot northwest over my head and stopped, and i stopped recording.  the video show white stream of the movement.  it amazed me to see it, but believable.  i suspected it was monitoring mar-largo as the newly elected trump was meeting the chinese pm at that time.
content.summary: I saw a red object that never noved.  i watched as i was walking dogs. finally i took phone and recored it.

content.detailedDescription:
The following event occurred on wednesday, april 4, 2018 at approximately 3:00 pm arizona time.

for around a half an hour i heard a fighter jet flying around the lake havasu city area. after around 20 minutes i was able to spot it directly overhead at an altitude much higher than 30k feet. it was barely visible and i only spotted it for a few seconds, but it was definitely identifiable as a fighter jet. it appeared to be flying in a tight circle. i can’t remember if it had a contrail or not. i lost track of it after just a few seconds, then heard it flying out of the area. after about a minute i heard it come back and again spotted it again flying in a circle and in just about the same spot. i lost track of it again after just a couple of seconds, and shortly afterward it left the area for good.

having already seen two unusual incidents in this area in the past couple of months, i bought a canon vixia hf r800 camcorder with 32x optical zoom, which arrived just over a week ago. it’s impossible to track objects on the display when they’re high in the sky in broad daylight, so i just kind of pan the camcorder around the sky in the general area of what i see and hope for the best. the focus was set to infinite and the zoom was set to 32x optical (no digital).  hopefully i can improvise some sort of crosshair on it before long.

after the second sighting, i went inside and downloaded about 10 minutes of video to the pc and was able to catch something. this first video is of a white object. i don’t know what it is. the perceived direction of flight is probably not the true direction or true speed because i was panning around slowly.  a few seconds into the video you see a commercial jet that was flying either to or away from la. i can’t remember which. the clip between the white object and the jet is unedited. it will give you a real good indication of their relative sizes. for most of the day, i thought maybe the small white object was the afterburner of the fighter jet. later on, i realized that if it was afterburner, then the jet maybe should have been bigger in the film. either way, i don’t know. i’m not an expert. one thing i do remember, though, both times when i saw the jet i don’t recall seeing any afterburner flame. i also know that when i twice observed the fighter jet it did not look anything like the white object in the video. it just looked like a fighter jet flying way up high in the sky. also attached is a screen print of the white object and the commercial jet side by side so you can compare relative observed sizes.
list of attachments:
ufo1 - short, real-time unedited video of the white object and a commercial airliner.
ufo1-slomo - edited clip showing white object in real-time then slow motion with orientation changed to fill the video better.
jet-sizes - picture of jet and white object side-by-side for size comparison.
content.summary: Fighter jet high above lake havasu city possibly accompanied by something else.
